blog-app.title: Social network of Blog Posts
blog-app.description: A place where you share your posts and follow posts from other users about various topics.

content.content: The Blog App is a platform designed to connect writers. A place where you can share your ideas and engage with a community. The app provides a collaborative environment where users can express themselves and participate in different discussions.
On the main page you find the latest posts made by the community.
Create a new account or log in to an existing account to have access to extra features.
You can also publish your own posts.
All pages are designed to function effectively across various screen resolutions, from mobile devices to desktops.

bilingual-reader.title: Bilingual Text Reader
bilingual-reader.description: Translate a text and read the original version and the translated one side by side.

content.content: Bilingual Reader is a web-based application designed to help users read and study texts in a foreign language with translations.
The application offers an interface with side-by-side views of the original text and its translation.
It includes a text-to-speech (TTS) feature that allows you to listen to the text. You can also click on individual sentences to listen to the audio for specific sections.
Compatibility with both desktop and mobile devices.
It has the option to switch between different texts. All texts are saved locally on your browser. You can remove them by pressing the "Remove" button on the text card.
A dark mode version. You can toggle dark mode on and off by clicking the sun/moon icon at the bottom of the page.

trybe-tunes.title: Music Player
trybe-tunes.description: A Website to listen to preview of songs.

content.content: Trybe Tunes is a web application where you can listen to song previews, search for artists, and check out albums.
It provides a music player designed specially for the website.
Profile page with the option to edit information about yourself
